translations: 管头管脚地监控（micromanage 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: There is a danger that Washington will end up micromanaging not only Detroit but also other parts of the economy.
sentences.translation: 危险的是，华盛顿最终不仅会对底特律进行微观管理，还会对其他经济领域进行微观管控。

sentences.sentence: But there is a danger that Washington will end up micromanaging not only Detroit but also other parts of the economy.
sentences.translation: 但危险的是，华盛顿最终不仅会对底特律进行微观管理，还会对其他经济领域进行微观管理
那位管理低能的首席执行官是……杰夫•贝索斯。
